recipesJson.name: Glaistig
recipesJson.author: RuntDastardly
recipesJson.description:
An intriguing mix of juicy, ripe berries, absinthe and a touch of mint, perfect for reinvigorating a bored palate.

Recommended Base: 70/30 VG/PG
Steep Time: 1 Week Minimum

reviews.text: This is one of my favorite mixes so far, and honestly I love this right after a good shake with no steep; this is easily an all day vape for me.  For my first few bottles, I used FA Anise at .5, and I took the Black Currant up to 1.0 since I didn't have the Absinthe, and it was still delectable albeit a bit skunky.  Now that I've got the Absinthe , I can review this amazing conglomeration.  Idk how the hell you came up with this, but you are a fracking genius.  It does gunk my shit up a bit, but it's entirely worth rewicking, if only to fill with more Glaistig.  Thank you Runt.
Okay look...I don't know what the hell this is, but it is great. This is beautiful and you are beautiful in your uniqueness. Keep being you, as this is truly a delight.
